about_the_game:
Starting your journey in EVE Online is an exciting prospect, and you can get going even faster by securing a Starter Pack, which includes valuable items to skyrocket your career in space. This pack will enable you to speed up your skill training, increase your standings with the factions of New Eden, and look amazing while doing it, all for a fantastic price.

The Starter Pack contains:

  • 7 days Omega
  • Core Ship Operations Expert System
  • 2 x Basic Glamourex Boosters
  • Venture Rockbreaker Pioneers SKIN
  • Merlin Zakura Shumyu SKIN
  • Punisher Zakura Shumyu SKIN
  • Rifter Zakura Shumyu SKIN
  • Incursus Zakura Shumyu SKIN

Omega unlocks double-skill training speed, access to advanced skills, and a wide range of EVE's biggest and best ships. The Core Ship Operations Expert System boosts your flying abilities for seven days, allowing you to try your hand at the skills before deciding to devote training time to them. The Basic Glamourex Booster elevates your social standings in New Eden by applying a 15% boost to agent, corporation, and faction standing increases. Lastly, you’ll get a selection of stunning SKINs to make sure you look your best as you start your journey in New Eden.

Single purchase per account.
detailed_description:
Steam Created Accounts Only

This content can only be accessed with EVE Online accounts created through Steam. Existing EVE Online accounts not created through Steam cannot benefit from it.


About the Game

Starting your journey in EVE Online is an exciting prospect, and you can get going even faster by securing a Starter Pack, which includes valuable items to skyrocket your career in space.   • Incursus Zakura Shumyu SKIN

Omega unlocks double-skill training speed, access to advanced skills, and a wide range of EVE's biggest and best ships. The Core Ship Operations Expert System boosts your flying abilities for seven days, allowing you to try your hand at the skills before deciding to devote training time to them. name: EVE Online: Starter pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz, AMD Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB or higher
  • Hard Drive: 23 GB Free Space
  • Video: AMD Radeon 5450 or NVIDIA GeForce 420 or better with at least 1024 MB VRAM
  • Network: ADSL connection (or faster)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700 or AMD Ryzen 7 1700 @ 3.6 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB or greater
  • Hard Drive: 23 GB free space
  • Video: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 580 or better with at least 4 GB VRAM
  • Network: ADSL connection or faster

supported_languages:
English*, German*, Russian*, French*, Korean*, Japanese*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
